fixed_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 60.8/63.8/66.9% of Attack. 33.8/35.5/37.2% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Maragidyne

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 154.5/162.2/170.0% of Attack.
innate_skill.name: Megaton Raid

innate_skill.name: Attack Master III

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 12.7%. Decrease SP cost of Fire skills by 37%.
